title: Shoots — Replace ideation blocks with text box + AI button
description: Remove the structured ideation output blocks (Roz, Editing assignment, Client approval, Boosting) and replace with a single editable text box. Add an 'Ideate shoot plan' button that generates an AI plan directly into the text box. Content is editable after generation.
acceptanceCriteria: Structured blocks (Roz, Editing, Client approval, Boosting) removed
Single text box present in notes/plan section
'Ideate shoot plan' button generates AI content into text box
Text box is fully editable after AI generation

steps.details: In the shoot detail/ideation component, remove the JSX rendering Roz, Editing assignment, Client approval, and Boosting blocks. Remove associated state and data handling.
Replace with a textarea or rich text input. Use a controlled component with local state. Style with bg-surface, border-nativz-border, min-height of 200px.
Add a Button inside or above the text area labeled 'Ideate shoot plan'. Wire it to call the existing /api/shoots/ideate endpoint (or equivalent).

steps.description: Populate AI response into text box
steps.details: On successful AI generation, set the text area value to the response. Show loading state on button while generating. Use streaming if the API supports it.
Save text box content on blur or via explicit save button. Call the shoots API to persist the plan content.

technicalNotes: Check existing /api/shoots/ideate endpoint — may need to adjust response format to return plain text instead of structured blocks
Consider debounced auto-save for the text area
